ProductInfo.Features:
Image sensor: 1/3" color CMOS. Horizontal resolution: 380 TV lines
IR illuminators: 30 IR LEDs for night vision. Minimum illumination: 0.0 Lux (IR LEDs on)
Camera lens: 6.0mm. Built-in microphone and audio circuit
Connection type: RCA video, RCA audio and 2.1 mm center positive power plug
Aluminum housing for indoor outdoor application. Adjustable swivel bracket can be mounted on the wall or ceiling
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Audio Bullet Security Camera Outdoor IR Infrared Day Night Vision Built-in Microphone for CCTV Home DVR Surveillance System with Power Supply and Extension Cable 3G1
